Text.val: 25.10.2012 SH SCR17528 Added GB324 to change encoding of outgoing files
25.10.2012 SH SCR17528 Added GB324 to change encoding of outgoing files
06.11.2008 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing
... prepare path/filename for CSV output file
-- If PI.CONNECTIONTYPE = blank or PI.SELECTIONTYPE <> 1 or 2 then skip further

ExpSyntax.val: NOT (ISNULL ({0,18})) AND NOT (ISNULL ({0,19})) AND ({0,3}='C' OR {0,3}='L' OR {0,3}='N')
MlsTrans ('PI.CONNECTIONTYPE = C/L/N and PI.SELECTIONTYPE = 1/2 are mandatory')
